item.title: James Webb Space Telescope captures a spooky view of the Pillars of Creation
item.description: James Webb Space Telescope captures a spooky view of the Pillars of Creation NASA has released another image that the James Webb Space Telescope has captured of the Pillars of Creation.

item.title: India fines Google $113 million for abusing the Play Store's dominance
item.description: India fines Google $113 million for abusing the Play Store’s dominance Google is on the hook for another nine-figure fine after Indiaâ€™s antitrust agency said the company abused the dominant position of the Play Store.

item.title: YouTube adds pinch-to-zoom on mobile as part of its latest redesign
item.description: YouTube adds pinch-to-zoom on mobile as part of its latest redesign YouTube is getting a fresh look and some extra features.
